an5.103:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato mahacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekagarikampi karoti, paripanthepi titthati.
an5.103:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacagi ca, ekacari ca.
an5.103:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro nadividuggam va nissito hoti pabbatavisamam va.
an5.103:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro visamanissito hoti.
an5.103:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro tinagahanam va nissito hoti rukkhagahanam va rodham va mahavanasandam va.
an5.103:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro gahananissito hoti.
an5.103:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro rajanam va rajamahamattanam va nissito hoti.
an5.103:4.4: ‘sace mam koci kinci vakkhati, ime me rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhanissanti’ti.
an5.103:4.5: Sace nam koci kinci aha, tyassa rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhananti.
an5.103:4.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro balavanissito hoti.
an5.103:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro addho hoti mahaddhano mahabhogo.
an5.103:5.4: ‘sace mam koci kinci vakkhati, ito bhogena patisantharissami’ti.
an5.103:5.5: Sace nam koci kinci aha, tato bhogena patisantharati.
an5.103:5.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro bhogacagi hoti.
an5.103:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro ekakova gahanani katta hoti.
an5.103:6.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro ekacari hoti.
an5.103:7.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahangehi samannagato mahacoro sandhimpi chindati nillopampi harati ekagarikampi karoti paripanthepi titthati.
an5.103:8.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato papabhikkhu khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an5.103:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacagi ca, ekacari ca.
an5.103:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu visamena kayakammena samannagato hoti, visamena vacikammena samannagato hoti, visamena manokammena samannagato hoti.
an5.103:9.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.
an5.103:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu micchaditthiko hoti antaggahikaya ditthiya samannagato.
an5.103:10.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
an5.103:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu rajanam va rajamahamattanam va nissito hoti.
an5.103:11.4: ‘sace mam koci kinci vakkhati, ime me rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhanissanti’ti.
an5.103:11.5: Sace nam koci kinci aha, tyassa rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhananti.
an5.103:11.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.
an5.103:12.4: ‘sace mam koci kinci vakkhati, ito labhena patisantharissami’ti.
an5.103:12.5: Sace nam koci kinci aha, tato labhena patisantharati.
an5.103:12.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu bhogacagi hoti.
an5.103:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu ekakova paccantimesu janapadesu nivasam kappeti.
an5.103:13.3: So tattha kulani upasankamanto labham labhati.
an5.103:13.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu ekacari hoti.
an5.103:14.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato papabhikkhu khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati”ti.
